root.name: Demise: Rise of the Ku'tan
root.description: Released in 1999, Demise: Rise of Ku'tan followed in the footsteps of Mordor: The Depths of Dejenol. Players create up to 4 heroes and once again explore the dungeon and it's many mysteries.New features include:A 3D engineUpdated GraphicsTweaked GameplayA new, larger dungeon

similar_games.game: Might and Magic VI: The Mandate of Heaven
